messages.subject: Thought's on this tsuba
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Guy s, asking around about this piece http://tinyurl.com/sdt6 , I have a few mixed ideas and answers about it. I originally thought mid/late edo Heianjô
messages.messageBody:
Hi Guy's, asking around about this piece http://tinyurl.com/sdt6 , I have a few mixed ideas and answers about it.

I originally thought mid/late edo Heianjô Zogan but possibly a Kagome or Kagome Shingen piece.

It has also been suggested it may be Shoami, Mito or maybe Nara

And another suggestion again was late Shoami or Yokohama dock shiirimono ( Yokohama dock shiirimono was also a thought I had )

Any ideas ?????

Rich





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
